name: Alma New Nightmare Demo
description:
You're on your own. No one to come for you. No one to help you. No one to hear you scream.
In this game you are in the forest you need to pick up 2 paper in full game.

the game has only 2 batteries.
Battery duration is 300 seconds.
This is my first game.
I'm not a pro in making games.
This is an amateur version of the game.
